desmoj.core.simulator

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.Parameter

  • public class Parameter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to Represent a Parameter. This parameter can be an experiment- parameter or a model-parameter. Parameters are variables that are accessible from everywhere in the model. Model-parameters are assignable from model, experiment-parameters from experiment.
    See Also:
    ParameterManager, ModelParameterManager, ExperimentParameterManager

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Parameter.ParameterType
      Enum to decide, if a parameter is a model-parameter or an experiment- parameter

      • getParameterType

        public Parameter.ParameterType getParameterType()
        Is this parameter a model-parameter or an experiment-parameter?
        Returns:
        ParameterType.MODELPARAMETER if this parameter is a model-parameter, or ParameterType.EXPERIMENTPARAMETER if this parameter is an experiment-parameter
